name: tailorapp-fullstack
description: Full-stack Tailor App with Flutter frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.deploy:github: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to production' && git push origin main
scripts.clean: flutter clean && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.ci:local: npm run lint:all && npm run test:all && npm run build:all
